pages.text: Peculiar Pieces includes many items allowing for easy, long distance travel. These mostly come in the form of pearls crafted from ender pearls.$(br)The Mod Author will accept no responsibility for any damage accidents or losses found from using teleportation items in a different dimension than where they are bound.
Spawnpoint Pearls will teleport any user to their spawnpoint (or the world spawn if they have no spawnpoint) when used.
Position Paper can be used to store a location and teleport to it. It can be set to any position with shift right click and then warp there with right click.
Similar to Position Paper, a Position Pearl can bring the user back to a location. The pearl is never consumed, but can only be bound to lodestones rather than anywhere.

Warp Blocks can be used to teleport players and entities to a predefined location. This is done by shift right clicking the warp block and inserting a pearl, the block will then teleport any entity that stands on top of it or right clicks it to the pearl's destination.
A Transport Pearl acts as an upgrade to a Position Pearl, allowing storage of up to 8 locations, which can be toggled through with shift right click.$(br)It is too large to fit in a Warp Block.
Sky Pearls will teleport their user to the highest block above them.
